ygData.subject: Re: [cantera] compilation problem
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not sure if this is the problem, but try setting USE_SUNDIALS to n in configure and then re-run configure .  This should be the default, but in the

I'm not sure if this is the problem, but try setting USE_SUNDIALS to  
'n' in 'configure' and then re-run 'configure'.  This should be the  
default, but in the latest version of 'configure' in CVS, it is set to  
'y'.


On Dec 5, 2005, at 5:41 PM, metsovios wrote:

> hello,
> I'm having this problem compling Cantera
>
> any help is greatly appreciated
> George
